translations: v.说笑话（joke 的三单形式）；和……开玩笑

phrs.translation: 以某人为笑柄；开某人玩笑

sentences.sentence: They all guffawed at his jokes.
sentences.translation: 他们听了他的笑话都一阵狂笑。

sentences.sentence: Her jokes really creased me up.
sentences.translation: 她的笑话真让我笑死了。

sentences.sentence: You never laugh at my jokes!
sentences.translation: 你们听了我的笑话从不发笑！
